DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study determine safety efficacy investigational product ( IHBG-10 ) weight change change body composition subject start take ( less three month ) certain anti-psychotic medication ( Risperdal , Seroquel , and/or Zyprexa ) .
DOC.brief_title: Anti-psychotic Medication ( New Use ) Weight Loss Study
DOC.detailed_description: A total 30 subject enrol study . They randomize one two group . One group ( 20 subject ) take 500 mg investigational product ( IHBG-10 ) 15 minute prior three main meal day ; subject continue take prescribed anti-psychotic medication . The group ( 10 subject ) take placebo 15 minute prior three main meal day ; subject continue take prescribed anti-psychotic medication . Subjects take investigational product placebo 12 week . Participation study involve 4 study visit .
DOC.criteria: Men woman , age 18 old Agree keep diet , exercise current health habit stable participation study Have take Risperdal ( Risperidone ) , Seroquel ( Quetiapine ) , Zyprexa ( Olanzapine ) less 3 month Current active acute psychotic episode Women pregnant , breastfeed plan become pregnant Prior bariatric surgery Use prescription overthecounter appetite suppressant , herbal product medication weight loss within past month Obesity result clinicallydiagnosed endocrine problem
